doc.after: In physical cosmology the Big Bang is the scientific theory that the universe emerged from a tremendously dense and hot state about 13 7 billion years ago The theory is based on the observations indicating the expansion of space in accord with the Robertson Walker model of general relativity as indicated by the Hubble redshift of distant galaxies taken together with the cosmological principle
